feat.name: Monster Hunter (HB)
feat.text:
You are adept at fighting and hunting monsters. Gain the following benefits.
Monster Tracker. You have advantage when making Wisdom (Survival) checks to track or identify attributes of a Beast or Monstrosity.
Monster Lore. You can add double your proficiency modifier when making Intelligence checks related to Beasts or Monstrosities.
Damage Reroll. Whenever you roll weapon damage against a Beast or Monstrosity, you can reroll the die if it rolls a 1, and you must use the new roll.
Source: GM Toolkit - Cryptids (Third Party)
